text.text: Berlin-Chemie has been developing, manufacturing and distributing pharmaceutical products for over 130 years and has been a wholly owned subsidiary of the Menarini Group, the leading Italian pharmaceutical company, since 1992. Within the Menarini Group, Berlin-Chemie is responsible for the pharmaceutical business in Germany, Central and Eastern Europe and the CIS region.

banner_v2_copy.jcr:description: The Menarini Group was founded in 1886 in Italy and is now present in 140 countries around the world.
banner_v2_copy.jcr:title: Menarini Group
